marytts.unitselection.concat

Class BaseUnitConcatenator

  • java.lang.Object
    • marytts.unitselection.concat.BaseUnitConcatenator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UnitConcatenator
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    OverlapUnitConcatenator

    public class BaseUnitConcatenator
extends Object
implements UnitConcatenator
    Concatenates Units and returns an audio stream
